For one thing, they’re promising eight new scenes per month. One per week is the industry standard, so that’s nearly double what most guys are offering, and you know what? That’s actually a conservative estimate on their end, because I’m looking at the recent updates right now and they’ve been adding new movies almost every single day.

This is the part of the review where I like to tell you exactly how many scenes are in any given library, free or premium, but it’s not so easy here. The platform’s got this endless-scroll type presentation, and only loads up half a dozen more movies every time you hit the Load More button. There are hundreds of movies here at least, potentially even thousands, but I can’t give you a full count.

It's kind of a clunky interface. Not being able to give you a number is only a small issue here. The bigger problem is that the setup adds some difficulty when it comes to browsing the catalog. You can reshuffle the stack by the usual criteria like Latest, Most Discussed and Most Upvoted, but I’m worried content is going to end up getting buried.

If you’re looking for something special, try that search bar. They don’t currently have a browsable index of keywords, but the catalog is well tagged and there’s a nice variety of hardcore sucking and fucking going on. She’s wearing fishnets and a red wig while she puffs on a cigarette with one hand, her other fingers petting her kitty. Remember what I said about African passion on video? Well, here it is in action.

I’d love to download the video, and for fifty bucks, I think I should be allowed to. It just wasn’t to be, though, at least not here at AfroSexxx. There’s no Download button, but some of the bigger nerds out there might be able to use a third-party downloader plugin. No promises, though.

The price might be a real motherfucker, but AfroSexxx.com carries a type of material that is sadly still a rare commodity on the internet, and they carry it in abundance. The real women and the real quality of the sex itself are AfroSexxx’s strongest selling points, and they’re on full display in those free previews out front. So, do you like your porn like you like your coffee or what?
